name: Felroot Demo
description:
Welcome to Felroot, an adventure game inspired by classic 16 bit titles like Zelda:Link to the Past, SoulBlazer, and Secret of Mana.  You were traveling the world when a storm hit your ship stranding you and many others on an island that has both ancient and modern ruins.  Why the island was abandoned by humans is a mystery to solve in the full game.  Best with controller.

Contains a few quests, one challenge dungeon, and a boss finish.  

Thank you for your consideration.
